Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Thanks ~ronenschafferibm . Do you believe the two linked Jiras are duplicates? If so, please Withdraw/Close as duplicate.

Action.author: ronenschafferibm
Action.body: It's hard to tell. In FAB-15557 there is a suspicion that the cause of the isolation is due to the lack of usable sockets and not due to this bug.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Need to port to release-1.4 still.
